learning_outcomes: Understand and use B1 Climate Change and Solutions vocabulary
Apply B1 grammar structures in context

blocks.title: B1 Practice: Climate Change and Solutions

content.prompt_es: Une cada término con su definición correspondiente:

pairs.right: A new idea or method in climate change solutions
The application of climate change solutions in real life
The systematic investigation into climate change solutions

content.prompt_es: Elige la opción correcta o reordena las palabras:
content.stimulus_en: She (read/usually) ________ about climate change solutions on weekends.
content.feedback_correct_es: ¡Excelente trabajo!

content.prompt_es: ¿Es gramaticalmente correcta la siguiente frase?: "We are go to explore the fundamentals of climate change solutions in this unit."
content.feedback_correct_es: ¡Correcto! Has detectado bien el error o la corrección.
content.feedback_incorrect_es: Revisa bien la estructura de los tiempos verbales B1.

options.text: Could you tell me more? I'm curious.
That sounds interesting, tell me more.
That's a pity. I'm sorry to hear that.
